name: UNITED STATES MARITIME ALLIANCE, LTD. (USMX)
description: Represents the shipping industry at East and Gulf Coast ports.
sampleDescriptions: Taft-Hartley Act process and impacts; modernizing U.S. port operations; implementation of the Ocean Shipping Reform Act (P.L. 117-146) and supply chain legislation.
